revised_title: Long Worm Infections and Treatment in the East-Indies
tldr: The author shares their experience with a long worm infection in the East-Indies. They describe the discomfort and pain they experienced, as well as the treatment they received from a surgeon. The surgeon applied remedies to kill the worm, lanced the leg, and drew it out, ultimately curing the infection.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Infectious Diseases
